review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
name: Christopher Crowe
title: Fun temporary art
text: Kidbro Magnetic Drawing Board for Toddlers & Kids, Magnetic Dot Art Large Doodle Board with Magnetic Pen and Colored Magnetic Beads, Montessori Educational Preschool Travel ToyMy 4 year old has been enjoying playing with this.It's your standard plastic variety kids toy.She was able to figure it out pretty quickly.Just make sure they understand it's temporary and how to carry it.Otherwise all of their excitement will wash away the first time they go to pick it up to show you what they've done.There are multiple pattern cards provided for the kids to follow to create pictures.This one did have one piece that was not magnetic.Will see if I can find a magnet strong enough to put on the back to hold designs in place.That could have made this a 5 star product.
